Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Department of State to promulgate standards and rules concerning the sanitization of mattresses that include requirements sufficient to eradicate bedbugs in reconditioned mattresses before their sale.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Promulgate standards and rules concerning the sanitization of mattresses that include requirements sufficient to eradicate bedbugs in reconditioned mattresses before their sale.

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending: Brewer, Mealy, Vann, Foster, Sears, Stewart, Arroyo, Rivera, Dickens, Lappin, Speaker Quinn and Mark-Viverito
